settings.description: Connect to your Home Assistant instance to control media players.
settings.token-hint: Create a Long-Lived Access Token at Profile > Security in Home Assistant.
settings.default-player-hint: Select the media player to control by default.

bar-widget.title: Bar widget
bar-widget.description: Adjust how the bar widget displays long titles.

max-width.label: Maximum width
max-width.description: Sets the maximum horizontal size of the widget. The widget will shrink to fit shorter content.

use-fixed-width.label: Use fixed width
use-fixed-width.description: When enabled, the widget will always use the maximum width instead of dynamically adjusting to content.

scrolling-mode.label: Scrolling mode
scrolling-mode.description: Control when text scrolling is enabled for long titles.

panel.settings-hint: Configure connection in Settings > Plugins > Home Assistant
